ComponentDefinition.LayoutDefinition:
<![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?> <LayoutDefinition xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Layout Name="Page" Type="RootLayout"> <Prolog> <Value><%@ Register TagPrefix="asp" Namespace="Recaptcha" Assembly="Recaptcha" %> <asp:Content id="PageSection" ContentPlaceHolderID="PageContent" Runat="server"> <a id="StartOfPageContent"></a> <GEN:UPDATEPANEL NAME="UpdatePanel1"></Value> </Prolog> <Row> <Cell> <Value><GEN:PANEL NAME="ForgotUserPanelTitleAndButtons"/></Value> <CellAttributes /> </Cell> <RowAttributes /> </Row> <Row> <Cell> <Value><%= SystemUtils.GenerateEnterKeyCaptureBeginTag(FindControlRecursively("SendButton")) %><GEN:PANEL NAME="ForgotUserPanelControl"/><%= SystemUtils.GenerateEnterKeyCaptureEndTag(FindControlRecursively("SendButton")) %></Value> <CellAttributes /> </Cell> <RowAttributes /> </Row> <Epilog> <Value><div id="detailPopup" class="detailRolloverPopup" onmouseout="detailRolloverPopupClose();" onmouseover="clearTimeout(gPopupTimer);"></div> <asp:ValidationSummary id="ValidationSummary1" ShowMessageBox="true" ShowSummary="false" runat="server"></asp:ValidationSummary> </asp:Content> </Value> </Epilog> <TableAttributes> <Attribute> <Name>cellpadding</Name> <AttributeValue>0</AttributeValue> </Attribute> <Attribute> <Name>cellspacing</Name> <AttributeValue>0</AttributeValue> </Attribute> <Attribute> <Name>border</Name> <AttributeValue>0</AttributeValue> </Attribute> <Attribute> <Name>width</Name> <AttributeValue>100%</AttributeValue> </Attribute> </TableAttributes> </Layout> <Layout Name="ForgotUserPanelTitleAndButtons"> <Prolog /> <Row> <Cell> <Value><GEN:BUTTON NAME="MenuButton"/></Value> <CellAttributes> <Attribute> <Name>class</Name> <AttributeValue>mobileHeaderLeft</AttributeValue> </Attribute> </CellAttributes> </Cell> <Cell> <Value><GEN:HTML NAME="DialogTitle"/></Value> <CellAttributes> <Attribute> <Name>class</Name> <AttributeValue>mobileHeaderTitle</AttributeValue> </Attribute> </CellAttributes> </Cell> <Cell> <Value><GEN:BUTTON NAME="SendButton"/></Value> <CellAttributes> <Attribute> <Name>class</Name> <AttributeValue>mobileHeaderRight</AttributeValue> </Attribute> </CellAttributes> </Cell> <RowAttributes /> </Row> <Epilog /> <TableAttributes> <Attribute> <Name>class</Name> <AttributeValue>mobileHeader</AttributeValue> </Attribute> <Attribute> <Name>cellpadding</Name> <AttributeValue>0</AttributeValue> </Attribute> <Attribute> <Name>cellspacing</Name> <AttributeValue>0</AttributeValue> </Attribute> <Attribute> <Name>border</Name> <AttributeValue>0</AttributeValue> </Attribute> <Attribute> <Name>width</Name> <AttributeValue>100%</AttributeValue> </Attribute> </TableAttributes> </Layout> <Layout Name="ForgotUserPanelControl"> <Prolog> <Value><asp:panel id="ForgotUserCollapsibleRegion" runat="server"></Value> </Prolog> <Row> <Cell> <Value><GEN:PANEL NAME="ForgotUserControl"/></Value> <CellAttributes> <Attribute> <Name>class</Name> <AttributeValue>mobileBody</AttributeValue> </Attribute> </CellAttributes> </Cell> <RowAttributes /> </Row> <Epilog> <Value></asp:panel></Value> </Epilog> <TableAttributes> <Attribute> <Name>cellpadding</Name> <AttributeValue>0</AttributeValue> </Attribute> <Attribute> <Name>cellspacing</Name> <AttributeValue>0</AttributeValue> </Attribute> <Attribute> <Name>border</Name> <AttributeValue>0</AttributeValue> </Attribute> <Attribute> <Name>width</Name> <AttributeValue>100%</AttributeValue> </Attribute> </TableAttributes> </Layout> <Layout Name="ForgotUserControl"> <Prolog /> <Row> <Cell> <CellAttributes> <Attribute> <Name>style</Name> <AttributeValue>height: 5px;</AttributeValue> </Attribute> <Attribute> <Name>class</Name> <AttributeValue>mobileBodyText</AttributeValue> </Attribute> </CellAttributes> </Cell> <RowAttributes /> </Row> <Row> <Cell> <Value><b><GEN:LABEL NAME="ForgotUserInfoLabel"/></b> <GEN:LABEL Name="ForgotUserErrorLabel" /></Value> <CellAttributes> <Attribute> <Name>class</Name> <AttributeValue>mobileBodyText</AttributeValue> </Attribute> </CellAttributes> </Cell> <RowAttributes /> </Row> <Row> <Cell> <CellAttributes> <Attribute> <Name>style</Name> <AttributeValue>height: 5px;</AttributeValue> </Attribute> <Attribute> <Name>class</Name> <AttributeValue>mobileBodyText</AttributeValue> </Attribute> </CellAttributes> </Cell> <RowAttributes /> </Row> <Row> <Cell> <Value><GEN:LABEL NAME="EnterEmailLabel"/></Value> <CellAttributes> <Attribute> <Name>class</Name> <AttributeValue>mobileFieldLabelOnTop</AttributeValue> </Attribute> </CellAttributes> </Cell> <RowAttributes /> </Row> <Row> <Cell> <Value><GEN:TEXTBOX NAME="Emailaddress" /></Value> <CellAttributes> <Attribute> <Name>class</Name> <AttributeValue>mobileFieldValueOnBottom</AttributeValue> </Attribute> </CellAttributes> </Cell> <RowAttributes /> </Row> <Row> <Cell> <CellAttributes> <Attribute> <Name>style</Name> <AttributeValue>height: 5px;</AttributeValue> </Attribute> <Attribute> <Name>class</Name> <AttributeValue>mobileBodyText</AttributeValue> </Attribute> </CellAttributes> </Cell> <RowAttributes /> </Row> <Row> <Cell> <Value><GEN:LABEL NAME="FillRecaptchaLabel"/></Value> <CellAttributes> <Attribute> <Name>class</Name> <AttributeValue>mobileFieldLabelOnTop</AttributeValue> </Attribute> </CellAttributes> </Cell> <RowAttributes /> </Row> <Row> <Cell> <Value><div id="recaptcha_widget" class="mobileRecaptchaContainer"> <div id="recaptcha_image" class="mobileRecaptchaImage"></div> </div>
<asp:panel id="recaptcha_response_holder" runat="server"> <input id="recaptcha_response_field" name="recaptcha_response_field" type="text" columns="20" text="" class="mobileFieldInput" /><br/> <input type="image" align="absbottom" src="../Images/MobileButtonRefresh.png" onclick="Recaptcha.reload();return false;" /> </asp:panel>
</Value> <CellAttributes> <Attribute> <Name>class</Name> <AttributeValue>mobileFieldValueOnBottom</AttributeValue> </Attribute> </CellAttributes> </Cell> <RowAttributes /> </Row> <Row> <Cell> <Value><asp:RecaptchaControl ID="recaptcha" runat="server" theme="clean" PublicKey="Enter your key here" PrivateKey="Enter your key here" /></Value> <CellAttributes> <Attribute> <Name>class</Name> <AttributeValue>mobileFieldValueOnBottom</AttributeValue> </Attribute> <Attribute> <Name>style</Name> <AttributeValue>display: none;</AttributeValue> </Attribute> </CellAttributes> </Cell> <RowAttributes /> </Row> <Epilog /> <TableAttributes> <Attribute> <Name>cellpadding</Name> <AttributeValue>1</AttributeValue> </Attribute> <Attribute> <Name>cellspacing</Name> <AttributeValue>1</AttributeValue> </Attribute> <Attribute> <Name>border</Name> <AttributeValue>0</AttributeValue> </Attribute> <Attribute> <Name>width</Name> <AttributeValue>100%</AttributeValue> </Attribute> <Attribute> <Name>class</Name> <AttributeValue>mobileBody</AttributeValue> </Attribute> </TableAttributes> </Layout> </LayoutDefinition>]]>
